entities.name: madam rosmerta
entities.description: Madam Rosmerta is described as scurrying down the dark street towards them on high-heeled, fluffy slippers, wearing a silk dressing-gown embroidered with dragons. She is introduced as someone who has seen Harry Apparate and knows they need help.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is described by Madam Rosmerta as being hurt.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as someone who has Apparated and needs help. He is also the one who tells Madam Rosmerta that Albus is hurt.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described by Harry as being hurt.

relationships.description: Madam Rosmerta saw Harry Apparate as she was pulling her bedroom curtains.
Madam Rosmerta is concerned for Dumbledore's well-being and asks Harry what's wrong with him.
Harry asks Madam Rosmerta if Albus can come into the Three Broomsticks while he goes up to the school and gets help for Dumbledore.
Harry is concerned for Albus's well-being and tells Madam Rosmerta that he's hurt.
Madam Rosmerta owns the Three Broomsticks, as Harry asks if Albus can come into it for help.
